metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3177 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Multiple use-after-free and double-free vulnerabilities in gifcolor.c in GIFLIB 5.1.2 have unspecified impact and attack vectors.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Flaw is in the gifcolor utility and not in the library

criterions.comment: giflib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
